title: Gateway
subtitle: The Credential Protocol
titleDescription: Your home to issue, manage, and consume verifiable credentials.

forUsers.secondaryTitle: Create a Gateway Credential space to drive your community, protocol, or DAO goals!

features.title: Your dedicated Space
features.description: Gateway’s credential space is fully customizable and modular, allowing you to control your Gateway to web3!

features.title: Issue Credentials
features.description: Gateway issues credentials in a decentralized manner via our protocol and covers gas fees for any NFTs minted!

features.title: Raise Brand Awareness
features.description: Gateway’s Credential space is a tool to drive social presence and promote your product.

features.title: Drive Product Engagement
features.description: Create quizzes, on-chain requirements, governance tasks, and more to engage users.

forOrganizations.mainTitle: Gateway SDK: Native Credential Issuance and Management
forOrganizations.secondaryTitle: Implement Gateway’s SDK by building credential models, define conditions for issuance, and consumption.

features.title: Build Data Models
features.description: Build your own claim structure for data that will be stored in a credential or use existing models.

features.title: Set Custom Conditions
features.description: Define when an issuance occurs by selecting a series of parameters that must be met.

features.title: Create Utility
features.description: Gateway credentials have endless usage from governance, to loyalty programs, access controls, and more!

features.title: Simple Management
features.description: Gateway’s credential model allows you to revoke a credential, set expirations, and reissue.

features.title: User Sovereignty
features.description: Gateway’s places your autonomy first. Our credentials are privacy preserving, yet publicly verifiable. We give users control over credential permissions and access.

features.title: Encrypted
features.description: Gateway’s credential data lives on Arweave, allowing for greater encryption over individual data sets. Allowing for you to gate your digital identity and protect your digital rights.

features.title: Composable
features.description: Credential existence can be verified on-chain, minted on any chain, while its information remains off-chain. Allowing for greater usage across web3!

buildAppsContent.title: The Gateway Standard
buildAppsContent.description: We provide the technology needed to issue, manage, index, and utilize credentials to build a robust digital identity.

features.title: Consumption
features.description: Credentials issued via Gateway can be used for governance weighting, community scores, credit scores, access controls, and much more!

features.title: Gateway Protocol
features.description: Gateway’s protocol allows organizations to easily manage and issue credentials, while Gateway handles the indexing and curation of data-models.

features.title: Data-Providers
features.description: Every engine needs it's fuel. Gateway's data partners support an open-source and composable data network, which serves as the basis of Gateway’s credential protocol.

scheduleDemoContent.title: See how Gateway can help your DAO

footerContent.receiveNews: Receive news about developments and updates.
